CustomField.description: Takes rent spending at any frequency and returns monthly spending
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Rent_Frequency__c, "Weekly"), 52*Rent__c/12, IF(ISPICKVAL(Rent_Frequency__c, "Monthly"), Rent__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Rent_Frequency__c, "Annually"), Rent__c/12,0)))
CustomField.label: Rent (monthly)
